description: An introduction to principles, methods and resources for effective and creative music teaching through the piano. Students observe demonstration teaching at various levels and individual and group settings, engage in peer teaching, analyze and perform teaching literature, and discuss topics such as technical development, learning stages and styles, and studio management. Offered spring semester 2019-20 and alternate years. Prerequisite: permission of instructor.
name: Keyboard Pedagogy
notes: This course includes an academic civic engagement (ACE) component.
